lead_paragraph: The authorities received a tip that the man, a Syrian, was planning an attack later this month, intensifying fears about Islamic extremism and migrants.

headline.print_headline: Germans Hold Asylum Seeker in Terror Case
headline.main: German Police Detain Asylum-Seeker Suspected of Plotting Terrorist Attack

snippet: The authorities received a tip that the man, a Syrian, was planning an attack later this month, intensifying fears about Islamic extremism and migrants....
abstract: German authorities arrest Syrian asylum-seeker in city of Mutterstadt after receiving tip that he was plotting terrorist attack during opening of national soccer league season; investigation into report is ongoing.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
